Although this section shouldn't include a <em>Most Improved</em> recognition from little league, for example, it should definitely include your <em>Marketer of the Month</em> award from your last position.</p> \n<h2><span>Free Resume Templates That Download in Word</span></h2> \n<p>Of course, if you’re already employed full-time, it’s hard to find the time to apply to a new job opportunity, let alone update your resume to reflect your qualifications. Luckily, there are numerous publishers out there who've created incredible resume templates for quick editing and formatting in Word.</p> \n<p>To keep you from hunting the internet for the resume templates that are both free and compatible with MS Word, we’ve listed 19 more options below for you to customize with your own information right now. Some of them come with variations so you can pick your favorite design. Four of them cater specifically to marketers.</p> \n<p>They’re so nice, you won’t believe they open up in Microsoft Word once you download them.</p> \n<h3>1. Monogram Header Resume Template</h3> \n<p>We'll start with a simple one. This is a HubSpot exclusive resume template that is simple and clean with attractive monogrammed headers to call out each section of the resume. The rest of the design relies on a simple serif font for easy reading, which is a good thing considering that hiring managers only take <a href=\"https://www.fastcompany.com/90263970/your-resume-only-gets-7-4-seconds-to-make-an-impression-heres-how-to-stand-out\">7.4 seconds</a> to evaluate a resume. You want your experience section to be easily scannable.</p> \n<h4 style=\"text-align: center;\">Download this template <a href=\"https://cdn2.hubspot.net/hubfs/53/blog-files/Monogram%20Header%20Resume%20Template.docx\">here</a>.</h4> \n<p><a href=\"https://cdn2.hubspot.net/hubfs/53/blog-files/Monogram%20Header%20Resume%20Template.docx\"><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Monogram%20Header%20Resume.png?width=450&amp;name=Monogram%20Header%20Resume.png\" alt=\"Monogram Header Resume\" width=\"450\" style=\"width: 450px; display: block; margin: 0px auto;\"></a></p> \n<h3>2. Maroon Sidebar Resume Template</h3> \n<p>Pulling your more text-heavy information off to the side in an attractive color-blocked sidebar, this resume lets your experience stand for itself in white space at the top. It's also easily customizable with no difficult-to-manipulate tables or formatting. The sidebars are in movable text boxes that can even be removed if you wish.</p> \n<h4 style=\"text-align: center;\">Download this template <a href=\"https://cdn2.hubspot.net/hubfs/53/blog-files/Maroon%20Sidebar%20Resume%20Template.docx\">here</a>.</h4> \n<p><a href=\"https://cdn2.hubspot.net/hubfs/53/blog-files/Maroon%20Sidebar%20Resume%20Template.docx\"><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Maroon%20Sidebar%20Resume.png?width=451&amp;name=Maroon%20Sidebar%20Resume.png\" alt=\"Maroon Sidebar Resume\" width=\"451\" style=\"width: 451px; display: block; margin: 0px auto;\"></a></p> \n<h3>3. Centered Bar Resume Template</h3> \n<p>This resume takes on a different look than most resumes, centered around a single bar. This makes the resume more visually striking, which could draw attention as hiring managers are evaluating candidates. It also puts emphasis on the objective with your chronological experience supporting it underneath. All of this is in an attractive serif font that is elegant and classy.</p> \n<h4 style=\"text-align: center;\">Download this template <a href=\"https://cdn2.hubspot.net/hubfs/53/blog-files/Centered%20Bar%20Resume%20Template.docx\">here</a>.</h4> \n<p><a href=\"https://cdn2.hubspot.net/hubfs/53/blog-files/Centered%20Bar%20Resume%20Template.docx\"><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Centered%20Bar%20Resume.png?width=451&amp;name=Centered%20Bar%20Resume.png\" alt=\"Centered Bar Resume\" width=\"451\" style=\"width: 451px; display: block; margin: 0px auto;\"></a></p> \n<h3>4. Bold Serif Resume Template</h3> \n<p>Speaking of serif font, this resume puts forward an element of grace and formality with its font choices. It's perfect for individuals who are looking for more organic color than the ones more typically found in resumes, and the colors are also easily changed in Microsoft Word's theme settings. It also includes a skill-level bar, adding a nice visual touch to the template.</p> \n<h4 style=\"text-align: center;\">Download this template <a href=\"https://cdn2.hubspot.net/hubfs/53/blog-files/Bold%20Serif%20Resume%20Template.docx\">here</a>.</h4> \n<p><a href=\"https://cdn2.hubspot.net/hubfs/53/blog-files/Bold%20Serif%20Resume%20Template.docx\"><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Bold%20Serif%20Resume.png?width=415&amp;name=Bold%20Serif%20Resume.png\" alt=\"Bold Serif Resume\" width=\"415\" style=\"width: 415px; display: block; margin: 0px auto;\"></a></p> \n<h3>5. Modern Chronological Resume Template</h3> \n<p>This resume template is available from Microsoft itself, and it’s one of many free templates the company has prepared for those who depend on Microsoft Office tools to create content. Yes, it is written in Times New Roman — don’t freak out.</p> \n<p>Designs like this can borrow an old-school typeface and still impress recruiters with a clean layout and subtle use of color. You can also change the font if you wish (and the same goes for every template in our list).</p> \n<h4>Download this template <a href=\"https://templates.office.com/en-us/Chronological-Resume-Modern-design-TM16402488\">here</a>.</h4> \n<p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/modern%20chronological%20resume%20template-1.png?width=1500&amp;name=modern%20chronological%20resume%20template-1.png\" width=\"1500\" style=\"width: 1500px; display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;\" alt=\"Modern chronological resume template for MS Word\"></p> \n<h3>6. Digital Marketing Resume Template</h3> \n<p>The digital marketing resume below comes from our own collection of resume templates, all of which open directly in MS Word.</p> \n<p>Coming with two pages total, this sheet holds a wealth of information and offers the perfect amount of style while maintaining professionalism. Mid-level marketers all the way up to CMOs can find this template valuable.</p> \n<h4 style=\"text-align: center;\">Download this template <a href=\"https://offers.hubspot.com/marketing-resume-templates\">here</a>.</h4> \n<p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/digital-marketing-executive-resume-template.png?width=455&amp;name=digital-marketing-executive-resume-template.png\" alt=\"Digital marketing resume template\" width=\"455\" style=\"width: 455px; display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;\"></p> \n<h3>7. Simple and Clean Resume Template</h3> \n<p>This template is the perfect balance of creative and modest -- best for the professional who wants to seem casual, thoughtful, but not over the top.</p> \n<p>Not only does it feature a space for a headshot on the top-left, but you can customize the color of that entire panel. Created by Zoki Design, the resume template also comes with a matching cover letter template.</p> \n<h4 style=\"text-align: center;\">Download this template <a href=\"http://zokidesign.com/portfolio/free-resume-template/\">here</a>.</h4> \n<p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/simple%20and%20clean%20resume%20template-1.png?width=500&amp;name=simple%20and%20clean%20resume%20template-1.png\" width=\"500\" style=\"width: 500px; display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;\" alt=\"Simple and clean resume template for MS Word\"></p> \n<h3>8. Black and White Resume Template</h3> \n<p>The Black and White resume template below suits professionals who prefer using color and shading to add structure to their resume.</p> \n<p>The black banner at the top contrasts the applicant's name nicely to help make him/her more memorable to recruiters. The gray banner just below the header is perfect for a summary or career objective — it makes one's goals known but doesn't overpower the experience listed below it.</p> \n<h4 style=\"text-align: center;\">Download this template <a href=\"https://resumegenius.com/resume-templates/creative-resume-templates#the-pantheon-resume-templates\">here</a>.</h4> \n<p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/black-and-white-resume-template.png?width=455&amp;name=black-and-white-resume-template.png\" alt=\"Black and white resume template\" width=\"455\" style=\"width: 455px; display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;\"></p> \n<h3>9. Urban Development Resume Template</h3> \n<p>The illustration on the top-left of this template shows who the designers at Hloom had in mind for this resume: civil engineers. But because it’s a Word document, that graphic is easy to edit and replace with an image that represents your line of work. Are you an analytics buff? Design a clever bar or line graph icon and place it next to your name in blue (or whatever color you’d like!).</p> \n<h4 style=\"text-align: center;\">Download this template <a href=\"https://www.hloom.com/get/urban+development/\">here</a>.</h4> \n<p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/urban%20development%20resume%20template-1.png?width=1500&amp;name=urban%20development%20resume%20template-1.png\" width=\"1500\" style=\"width: 1500px; display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;\" alt=\"Civil engineer's resume template for MS Word\"></p> \n<h3>10. Email Marketing Resume Template</h3> \n<p>Red color never fails to stick out on a sheet of paper, especially if it's included in small amounts. The resume template for email marketers, below, captures that balance.</p> \n<p>In addition to the professional title in the top-righthand corner, this template also stands out with a thin sans-serif font, helping make a lot of text easier for a recruiter to digest and read through.</p> \n<h4 style=\"text-align: center;\">Download this template <a href=\"https://offers.hubspot.com/marketing-resume-templates\">here</a>.</h4> \n<p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/email-marketing-resume-template.png?width=1500&amp;name=email-marketing-resume-template.png\" width=\"1500\" style=\"width: 1500px; display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;\" alt=\"Email marketing resume template with red header text\"></p> \n<h3>11. Info Pop Resume Template</h3> \n<p>This one, also from Hloom, gives you exactly what the name suggests: ample space for the <em>info</em> you need, with headers that <em>pop</em> just enough to get your employer’s attention.</p> \n<p>Although the template fits a ton of text, its soft color palate prevents the document from seeming overwhelming.</p> Download this template \n<a href=\"https://www.hloom.com/get/info+pop/\">here</a>.\n<br> \n<p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/info%20pop%20resume%20template-1.png?width=1500&amp;name=info%20pop%20resume%20template-1.png\" width=\"1500\" style=\"width: 1500px; display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;\" alt=\"Info Pop resume template for MS Word\"></p> \n<h3>12. Dark Resume Template</h3> \n<p>Ironically, a dark background could be just the thing to ensure your resume doesn't fall into the black hole of resumes piled on the hiring manager's desk.</p> \n<p>Using soft, yellow font, the resume template below inverts the usual color scheme of a resume without trying too hard to be creative.</p> \n<h4 style=\"text-align: center;\">Download this template <a href=\"https://www.freesumes.com/dark-resume-template-freebie-elegant-dark-grey/\">here</a>.</h4> \n<p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/dark-resume-template.png?width=1500&amp;name=dark-resume-template.png\" alt=\"Dark resume template with black background and yellow font\" width=\"1500\" style=\"width: 1500px; display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;\"></p> \n<h3>13. Neat and Confident Resume Template</h3> \n<p>Similar to the Simple and Clean template mentioned earlier, this resume design by Nowpixelse communicates a truly professional tone. The template’s muted colors work very well with the side panel layered over the top header.</p> \n<h4 style=\"text-align: center;\">Download this template <a href=\"http://nowpixelse.com/my-product/free-ms-word-resume\">here</a>.</h4> \n<p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/neat%20and%20confident%20resume%20template-1.jpg?width=1500&amp;name=neat%20and%20confident%20resume%20template-1.jpg\" alt=\"Neat and Confident resume template for MS Word\" width=\"1500\" style=\"width: 1500px; display: block; margin: 0px auto;\"></p> \n<h3>14. Inbound Marketing Resume Template</h3> \n<p>Here's another resume template dedicated to the digital marketer. This sheet offers all the inbound marketing language you need to express your values as a passionate, brand-loyal professional.</p> \n<p>Similar to a few other templates on this list, it also uses just a dash of vibrant color in the applicant's name at the top (where it matters most).</p> \n<h4 style=\"text-align: center;\">Download this template <a href=\"https://offers.hubspot.com/marketing-resume-templates\">here</a>.</h4> \n<p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/inbound-marketing-intern-resume-template.png?width=1500&amp;name=inbound-marketing-intern-resume-template.png\" alt=\"Inbound marketing template for interns and marketers\" width=\"1500\" style=\"width: 1500px; display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;\"></p> \n<h3>15. Smart and Professional Resume Template</h3> \n<p>This is another sharp template that offers a basic but confident design for any professional. The warm-colored panel on the right-hand side is pre-formatted for a written profile, where you can write a summary of your background or a form letter to each employer.</p> \n<p>Just be sure to personalize this messaging to each new recipient so it works for the job you’re applying to. This template is available on Freesumes, and is free to users once they share the page to Facebook or Twitter.</p> \n<h4 style=\"text-align: center;\">Download this template <a href=\"https://www.freesumes.com/free-creative-resume-design-smart-professional/\">here</a>.</h4> \n<p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/smart%20and%20professional%20resume%20template-1.jpg?width=1500&amp;name=smart%20and%20professional%20resume%20template-1.jpg\" alt=\"Smart and Professional resume template for MS Word\" width=\"1500\" style=\"width: 1500px; display: block; margin: 0px auto;\"></p> \n<h3>16. Spick and Span Resume Template</h3> \n<p>There isn't a better name for the template below. The Spick and Span resume might be the cleanest-looking sheet on this list.</p> \n<p>It uses boldface, all-caps, and gray typeface to structure various headers of the document differently and maximize the hiring manager's reading experience. And all that minimalism makes the professional headshot at the top pop off the page.</p> \n<h4 style=\"text-align: center;\">Download this template <a href=\"https://www.freesumes.com/spick-span-clean-resume-template-freebie/\">here</a>.</h4> \n<p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/spick-and-span-resume-template.png?width=1500&amp;name=spick-and-span-resume-template.png\" alt=\"Spick and Span resume template with clean, bold typeface and professional headshot\" width=\"1500\" style=\"width: 1500px; display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;\"></p> \n<h3>17. Timeline-Style Resume Template</h3> \n<p>Similar to the Centered Bar resume earlier in the post, Hloom’s Timeline template is a super simple but creative way to tell your story.</p> \n<p>You can convey your progression through various jobs you’ve held on one side of the vertical line, and more static elements of your background — such as skills and education — on the other.</p> \n<h4 style=\"text-align: center;\">Download this template <a href=\"https://www.hloom.com/get/timeline/\">here</a>.</h4> \n<p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/timeline-style%20resume%20template-2.png?width=1500&amp;name=timeline-style%20resume%20template-2.png\" width=\"1500\" style=\"width: 1500px; display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;\" alt=\"Timeline-style resume template for MS Word\"></p> \n<h3>18. Content Production Resume Template</h3> \n<p>This basic resume template is suited for content producers at all stages in their career. By spreading out the header and \"Skills\" text horizontally, the resume below fits a lot of crucial information comfortably on one page (of course, it also comes with a second page if you need it).</p> \n<h4 style=\"text-align: center;\">Download this template <a href=\"https://offers.hubspot.com/marketing-resume-templates\">here</a>.</h4> \n<p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/content-production-resume-template.png?width=1500&amp;name=content-production-resume-template.png\" alt=\"Content production resume template\" width=\"1500\" style=\"width: 1500px; display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;\"></p> \n<h3>19. Fresh Resume Template</h3> \n<p>This is perhaps the most imaginative of all the Word-based resume templates on this list — with both a skills meter and a comic headshot.</p> \n<p>The template was designed by <a href=\"https://www.behance.net/venkatanaresh\">Venkata Naresh</a> and comes with 12 different versions of the design you see below. Have you created a <a href=\"https://www.bitmoji.com/\">Bitmoji</a> of yourself? Do you think your employer would find it creative? Match the template and add it as your photo.</p> \n<h4 style=\"text-align: center;\">Download this template <a href=\"http://smashresume.com/downloads/professional-fresh-resume/\">here</a>.</h4> \n<p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/fresh%20resume%20template-1.jpg?width=1500&amp;name=fresh%20resume%20template-1.jpg\" alt=\"Resume template for MS Word with space for comic headshot\" width=\"1500\" style=\"width: 1500px; display: block; margin: 0px auto;\"></p> \n<h3>20. CV Resume Template</h3> \n<p>The curriculum vitae-style resume below flips the typical two-column resume so the basic applicant information is listed across the right side, rather than the left.</p> \n<p>Feel free to change the color of this sidebar in Microsoft Word if dark-red isn't your thing — the template can pull off any color you wish.</p> \n<h4 style=\"text-align: center;\">Download this template <a href=\"https://www.freesumes.com/unconventional-cv-template-giveaway-avant-garde/\">here</a>.</h4> \n<p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/cv-resume-template.png?width=1500&amp;name=cv-resume-template.png\" width=\"1500\" style=\"width: 1500px; display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;\" alt=\"Reverse two-column resume template in CV style with red sidebar\"></p> \n<h3>21. Goldenrod Resume Template</h3> \n<p>This template, also offered on Freesumes, dares to use yellow as the dominant color — but doesn’t sacrifice professionalism in the process.</p> \n<p>The document anchors the education section to a thick, bright banner across the bottom, but you can likely change this to a skills section with some simple editing in Microsoft Word.</p> \n<h4 style=\"text-align: center;\">Download this template <a href=\"https://www.freesumes.com/goldenrod-yellow-a-free-clean-word-resume-template/\">here</a>.</h4> \n<p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/goldenrod%20resume%20template-1.jpg?width=1500&amp;name=goldenrod%20resume%20template-1.jpg\" alt=\"Goldenrod yellow resume template for MS Word\" width=\"1500\" style=\"width: 1500px; display: block; margin: 0px auto;\"></p> \n<h3>22. Resume Template With Personal Endorsements</h3> \n<p>This resume template has quite a flashy header — no photography pun intended — but it’s not just for photographers. What makes this resume unique is the space for references on the lower right-hand side.</p> \n<p>Does your field need others to vouch for your experience? This resume gives you room for three solid recommendations.</p> \n<h4 style=\"text-align: center;\">Download this template <a href=\"https://www.hloom.com/get/personal+endorsements/\">here</a>.</h4> \n<p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/resume%20template%20with%20personal%20endorsements-2.png?width=1500&amp;name=resume%20template%20with%20personal%20endorsements-2.png\" width=\"1500\" style=\"width: 1500px; display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;\" alt=\"Photographer's resume template for MS Word with space for recommendations and endorsements\"></p> \n<h3>23. Creative Resume Template</h3> \n<p>This one was designed by the stationery experts at MOO and is offered for download by Microsoft. Simple but vibrant, this template hugs the text with an artistic header and footer — great for recent graduates who need to fill empty space on the page.</p> \n<h4 style=\"text-align: center;\">Download this template <a href=\"https://templates.office.com/en-us/Creative-resume-designed-by-MOO-TM16392718\">here</a>.</h4> \n<p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/creative%20resume%20template-1.png?width=1500&amp;name=creative%20resume%20template-1.png\" width=\"1500\" style=\"width: 1500px; display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;\" alt=\"Resume template for MS Word with header and footer design\"></p> \n<h3>24. Modern Resume Template</h3> \n<p>This resume embraces simplicity with a slight touch of color to make things a bit more interesting. It also nicely sections off Skills and Education notes from the Work History list.</p> \n<p>With LiveCareer.com, you can generate a template with your basic information and then download it to add small details.</p> \n<h4 style=\"text-align: center;\">Download this template <a href=\"https://www.livecareer.com/build-resume/section/cntc?templateflow=contact&amp;skin=MLT6&amp;theme=%2339c3b1\">here</a>.</h4> \n<p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Screen%20Shot%202019-10-03%20at%202.05.44%20PM.jpg?width=1500&amp;name=Screen%20Shot%202019-10-03%20at%202.05.44%20PM.jpg\" alt=\"Modern Resume Template\" width=\"1500\" style=\"width: 1500px; display: block; margin: 0px auto;\"></p> \n<h3>25. Functional Resume Template</h3> \n<p>This NovoResume.com template is colorful and includes a place for your headshot which could make you look both interesting and confident to an employer.</p> \n<p>A colorful format like this might be great for someone in the media or advertising industry that wants to keep their job application visually memorable to prospective employers.</p> \n<h4 style=\"text-align: center;\">Download this template <a href=\"https://novoresume.com/editor/new-resume-preview/1?pageAuthDesired=/editor/new-resume/1\">here</a>.</h4> \n<h3><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/functional-resume-template.jpg?width=1500&amp;name=functional-resume-template.jpg\" alt=\"functional resume template\" width=\"1500\" style=\"width: 1500px; display: block; margin: 0px auto;\">26. Elegant Resume Template</h3> \n<p>If you're looking for simplicity and efficiency rather than something colorful, consider this Elegant Resume Template from Jofibo.</p> \n<p>With Jofibo, you can select this or other similar templates on the website, enter your information, and then download it quickly and easily.</p> \n<h4 style=\"text-align: center;\">Download this template <a href=\"https://jofibo.com/resume-templates/\">here</a>.</h4> \n<h3><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Screen%20Shot%202019-10-03%20at%202.23.03%20PM.png?width=1500&amp;name=Screen%20Shot%202019-10-03%20at%202.23.03%20PM.png\" alt=\"elegant resume template\" width=\"1500\" style=\"width: 1500px; display: block; margin: 0px auto;\">27. Blue Corporate HR Resume Template</h3> \n<p>Canva, an easy-to-use design template website, offers a few great resume templates. One of them is this simple resume with a touch of color in the background.</p> \n<p>Because of the color and image, it's pretty memorable. But, for those who prefer a more conservative resume look, this template is fairly simple.</p> \n<h4 style=\"text-align: center;\">Download this template <a href=\"https://www.canva.com/templates/MADftnj-Tj4-blue-corporate-hr-professional-resume/\">here</a>.</h4> \n<h3><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/canva-blue-corporate-hr-professional-resume-MADftnj-Tj4%20(1).jpg?width=1500&amp;name=canva-blue-corporate-hr-professional-resume-MADftnj-Tj4%20(1).jpg\" alt=\"corporate hr professional resume\" width=\"1500\" style=\"width: 1500px; display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;\">28. Concept Resume</h3> \n<p>This resume is great for people in the technical space because it adds a touch of color and feels more compact, which will force you to get right to the point about your key skills, certifications, and work experiences.</p> \n<h4 style=\"text-align: center;\">Download this template <a href=\"https://resumelab.com/resume-templates\">here</a>.</h4> \n<p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Screen%20Shot%202019-10-03%20at%202.36.46%20PM.png?width=1500&amp;name=Screen%20Shot%202019-10-03%20at%202.36.46%20PM.png\" alt=\"Concept Resume Template\" width=\"1500\" style=\"width: 1500px; display: block; margin: 0px auto;\"></p> \n<h3>29. Cream and Green Account Executive Resume Template</h3> \n<p>This resume is also downloadable and editable on Canva. It was created for account executives but could also be great for graphic designers or people working in visual fields due to its unique, but still professional, color scheme.</p> \n<h4 style=\"text-align: center;\">Download or edit the resume template <a href=\"https://www.canva.com/templates/MADk-BomAYs-cream-and-green-flat-design-account-executive-business-commercial-resume/\">here</a>.</h4> \n<p><img src=\"https://marketplace.canva.com/MADk-BomAYs/1/0/thumbnail_large/canva-cream-and-green-flat-design-account-executive-business-commercial-resume-MADk-BomAYs.jpg\" alt=\"Cream and Green Account Executive Resume Template\" width=\"1500\" style=\"width: 1500px; display: block; margin: 0px auto;\"></p> \n<h2>How to Save Your Resume</h2> \n<p>Remember, once you’ve finished personalizing your resume, you’re not ready to submit an application yet. To ensure your <a href=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/marketing/how-to-format-resume\">resume’s format</a> stays the same for everyone who receives it, save the document as a PDF. Best case scenario? Even the hiring manager won’t believe your resume came from Word.</p> \n<p><em>Editor's Note: This post was originally published in 2018 but was updated in May 2020 for comprehensiveness.</em></p> line-style%20resume%20template-2.png?width=1500&name=timeline-style%20resume%20template-2.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx8/cdn95@2020_4/2020/08/24/23-22-19-927_3ab21d73b542bf90.webp","https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/content-production-resume-template.png?width=1500&name=content-production-resume-template.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx18/cdn22@2020_4/2020/08/24/23-22-26-174_aac3f82ddc64cb44.webp","https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/fresh%20resume%20template-1.jpg?width=1500&name=fresh%20resume%20template-1.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn88@2020_6/2020/08/24/23-22-28-451_7903defd235cdab5.webp","https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/cv-resume-template.png?width=1500&name=cv-resume-template.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx1/cdn68@2020_1/2020/08/24/23-22-20-104_7f07d1c6a2597391.webp","https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/goldenrod%20resume%20template-1.jpg?width=1500&name=goldenrod%20resume%20template-1.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx10/cdn56@2020_4/2020/08/24/23-22-19-989_4a85062db6e2a3f3.webp","https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/resume%20template%20with%20personal%20endorsements-2.png?width=1500&name=resume%20template%20with%20personal%20endorsements-2.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx21/cdn78@2020_3/2020/08/24/23-22-23-038_b47a2aaf3799e34b.webp","https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/creative%20resume%20template-1.png?width=1500&name=creative%20resume%20template-1.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx21/cdn26@2020_1/2020/08/24/23-22-26-057_de7229997867d69b.webp","https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Screen%20Shot%202019-10-03%20at%202.05.44%20PM.jpg?width=1500&name=Screen%20Shot%202019-10-03%20at%202.05.44%20PM.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx18/cdn20@2020_2/2020/08/24/23-22-20-065_26ea69494ef56ddf.webp","https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/functional-resume-template.jpg?width=1500&name=functional-resume-template.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn56@2020_1/2020/08/24/23-22-19-976_483d01add479399d.webp","https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Screen%20Shot%202019-10-03%20at%202.23.03%20PM.png?width=1500&name=Screen%20Shot%202019-10-03%20at%202.23.03%20PM.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn62@2020_2/2020/08/24/23-22-27-418_161039b66ec52570.webp","https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/canva-blue-corporate-hr-professional-resume-MADftnj-Tj4%20(1).jpg?width=1500&name=canva-blue-corporate-hr-professional-resume-MADftnj-Tj4%20(1).jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx23/cdn19@2020_3/2020/08/24/23-22-24-460_3f87d6e726baab39.webp","https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Screen%20Shot%202019-10-03%20at%202.36.46%20PM.png?width=1500&name=Screen%20Shot%202019-10-03%20at%202.36.46%20PM.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx23/cdn53@2020_1/2020/08/24/23-22-26-333_0cda40a753b3b283.webp","https://marketplace.canva.com/MADk-BomAYs/1/0/thumbnail_large/canva-cream-and-green-flat-design-account-executive-business-commercial-resume-MADk-BomAYs.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx30/cdn39@2020_3/2020/08/24/23-22-19-946_a79f97f999f2e046.webp","https://track.hubspot.com/__ptq.gif?a=53&k=14&r=https%3A%2F%2Fblog.hubspot.com%2Fmarketing%2Fresume-templates-word&bu=https%253A%252F%252Fblog.hubspot.com%252Fmarketing&bvt=rss":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx16/cdn1@2020_2/2020/08/24/23-22-25-992_89f0657ea58a2f78.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598311336436},{"createdTime":"2020-08-25 07:22:16","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 07:22:16","title":"11 Sample Business Plans to Help You Write Your Own","link":"https://blog.hubspot.com/marketing/sample-business-plans","description":"<p>Ask any successful sports coach how they win so many games, and they’ll tell you they have a unique plan for every single game they coach. To have a fighting chance against any of their opponents, they need to prepare a specific game plan tailored to each of their opponents’ strengths and weaknesses. Otherwise, they’ll get crushed.</p>  \n<p>The same logic applies to business. If you want to build a thriving company that can pull ahead of the competition, you need to prepare yourself for battle before you break into a market. Because companies who can find gaps in your business model will quickly learn how to fill those gaps and solve your customers’ problems better than you can.</p> \n<p style=\"font-size: 18px;\">The business world moves fast, and it’s full of ambitious companies scrambling to gain the majority of their industry’s market share. So how do you keep up? Writing a viable business plan and following it religiously is one of the most important first steps.</p> \n<p>Business plans guide you along the rocky journey of growing a company. Referencing one throughout your voyage will keep you on the path toward success. And if your business plan is compelling enough, it can also convince investors to give you funding.</p> \n<p>But how do you actually write a viable and convincing business plan?</p> \n<p>Below, let's review the format of a business plan and sample business plans you can use to inspire your own.</p> \n<p></p> \n<h2>Business Plan Format</h2> \n<p>Before you get started on your business plan, you might be wondering, <em>\"Where do I start? How should I format this?\"</em></p> \n<p>Typically, a business plan is a document that will detail how a company will achieve its goals.</p> \n<p>Most business plans include the following sections:</p> \n<ul> \n <li>Executive summary: This section will include an overview of the company, your unique value proposition, and a team overview.</li> \n <li>Market opportunity: This is where you'll detail the opportunity in the market. Where is the gap in the current industry and how will your product fill that gap?</li> \n <li>Key features and benefits: At some point in your business plan, you'll review the key features and benefits of your products and/or services.</li> \n <li>Pricing and revenue: This is where you'll discuss your cost structure and various revenue streams.</li> \n <li>Target audience: This section will describe who your customer segments are in detail. What is the demographic and psychographic information of your audience?</li> \n <li>Marketing strategy: Here, you'll discuss how you'll acquire new customers with your marketing strategy.</li> \n <li>Competitive landscape: This is where you'll detail who the top competitors are.</li> \n <li>Financials: This is where you'll detail the funding that's required and discuss investment opportunities.</li> \n</ul> \n<p>While some business plans might include more or less information, these are the key details you'll want to include.</p> \n<p>Keep in mind, that each of these sections will be formatted differently. Some may be in paragraph format, while others will be in charts.</p> \n<p>Now that you know what's included and how to format a business plan, let's review some templates.</p> \n<h2>Sample Business Plan Templates</h2> \n<h3>1. <a href=\"https://www.hubspot.com/business-templates/one-page-business-plan?hubs_post-cta=imagesir\">HubSpot's One-Page Business Plan</a></h3> \n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/One-Page%20Business%20Plan%20Template.jpg?width=1500&amp;name=One-Page%20Business%20Plan%20Template.jpg\" alt=\"ffree editable one-page business plan pdf template\" width=\"1500\" style=\"width: 1500px; display: block; margin: 0px auto;\"><a href=\"https://offers.hubspot.com/business-plan-template?hubs_post-cta=imagesir\"><em>Download a free, editable one-page business plan template.&nbsp;</em></a></p> \n<p>The business plan linked above was created here at HubSpot, and is perfect for businesses of any size -- no matter how much strategy they still have to develop.&nbsp;</p> \n<p>Including fields such as Company Description, Required Funding, and Implementation Timeline, this one-page business plan&nbsp;gives businesses a framework for how to build their brand and what tasks to keep track of as they grow. Then, as the business matures, it can expand on its original business plan with a new iteration of the above document.</p> \n<h3>2. <a href=\"https://offers.hubspot.com/business-plan-template?hubs_post-cta=body\">HubSpot's Downloadable Business Plan Template</a></h3> \n<p>We created&nbsp;a <a href=\"https://offers.hubspot.com/business-plan-template?_ga=2.127437454.286928102.1577976255-1307414301.1541080541\">business plan template</a> for entrepreneurs.</p> \n<p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Screen%20Shot%202020-08-07%20at%204.02.33%20PM.png?width=1500&amp;name=Screen%20Shot%202020-08-07%20at%204.02.33%20PM.png\" width=\"1500\" style=\"width: 1500px; display: block; margin: 0px auto;\" alt=\"hubspot free editable business plan pdf template\"></p> \n<h6 style=\"text-align: center; font-weight: normal;\"><a href=\"https://offers.hubspot.com/business-plan-template?hubs_post-cta=imagesir\"><em>Download a free, editable one-</em><em>page</em><em> business plan template.&nbsp;</em></a></h6> \n<p>The template is designed as a guide and checklist for starting your own business, so you’ll learn what to include in each section of your business plan and how to do it. There’s also a list for you to check off when you finish each section of your business plan.</p> \n<p>Strong game plans help coaches win games and help businesses rocket to the top of their industries. So if you dedicate the time and effort required to write a viable and convincing business plan, you’ll boost your chances of success and even dominance in your market.</p> \n<h3>3. <a href=\"https://www.thoughtco.com/sample-business-plan-4083327\">ThoughtCo’s Sample Business Plan </a></h3> \n<p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/thoughtco-sample-business-plan.jpg?width=393&amp;name=thoughtco-sample-business-plan.jpg\" alt=\"Fictional business plan by ThoughtCo.\" width=\"393\" style=\"width: 393px; display: block; margin: 0px auto;\"></p> \n<p>If you want to reference an actual business plan while writing your own, ThoughtCo’s got you covered. They created a fictional company called Acme Management Technology and wrote an entire business plan for them.</p> \n<p>Using their sample business plan as a guide while filling out your own will help you catch and include small yet important details in your business plan that you otherwise might not have noticed.</p> \n<h3>4. <a href=\"https://www.bplans.com/downloads/business-plan-template/\">BPlan’s Free Business Plan Template</a></h3> \n<p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/bp-plans-business-template.jpg?width=364&amp;name=bp-plans-business-template.jpg\" alt=\"BPlan's free business plan template.\" width=\"364\" style=\"width: 364px; display: block; margin: 0px auto;\"></p> \n<p>One of the more financially oriented sample business plans in this list, BPlan’s free business plan template dedicates many of its pages to your business’ financial plan and financial statements.</p> \n<p>After filling this business plan out, your company will truly understand its financial health and the steps you need to take to maintain or improve it.</p> \n<h3>5. <a href=\"https://hbr.org/1985/05/how-to-write-a-winning-business-plan\">Harvard Business Review’s “How to Write a Winning Business Plan”</a></h3> \n<p>Most sample business plans teach you what to include in your business plan, but this Harvard Business Review article will take your business plan to the next level -- it teaches you the why and how behind writing a business plan.</p> \n<p>With the guidance of Stanley Rich and Richard Gumpert, co-authors of <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/Business-Plans-That-Win-Enterprise/dp/0060913916\">Business Plans That Win: Lessons From the MIT Enterprise Forum</a>, you'll learn how to write a convincing business plan that emphasizes the market demand for your product or service and the financial benefits investors can reap from putting money into your venture, rather than trying to sell them on how great your product or service is.</p> \n<h3>6. <a href=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/sales/how-to-start-a-business\">HubSpot’s Complete Guide to Starting a Business</a></h3> \n<p>If you’re an entrepreneur, you know writing a business plan is one of the most challenging first steps to starting a business. Fortunately, with HubSpot's comprehensive guide to starting a business, you'll learn how to map out all the details of your business by understanding what to include in your business plan and why it’s important to include them. The guide also fleshes out an entire sample business plan for you.</p> \n<p>If you need further guidance on starting a business, HubSpot's guide can teach you how to make your business legal, choose and register your business name, fund your business, gives information about small business tax, and provides marketing, sales, and service tips.</p> \n<h3>7. <a href=\"https://www.pandadoc.com/free-business-plan-template/\">Panda Doc’s Free Business Plan Template</a></h3> \n<p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/panda-doc-sample-business-plan.jpg?width=449&amp;name=panda-doc-sample-business-plan.jpg\" alt=\"Panda Doc free business plan template.\" width=\"449\" style=\"width: 449px; display: block; margin: 0px auto;\"></p> \n<p>Panda Doc’s free business plan template is one of the more detailed and fleshed out sample business plans on this list. It describes what you should include in each of its sections, so you don't have to come up with everything from scratch.</p> \n<p>Once you fill it out, you’ll fully understand your business’ nitty gritty details and how all of its moving parts should work together to contribute to your business’ success.</p> \n<h3>8. <a href=\"https://www.sba.gov/business-guide/plan-your-business/write-your-business-plan\">Small Business Administration Free Business Plan Template</a></h3> \n<p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/small-business-administration-sample-business-plan.jpg?width=600&amp;name=small-business-administration-sample-business-plan.jpg\" alt=\"Small Business Administration sample business plan.\" width=\"600\" style=\"width: 600px; display: block; margin: 0px auto;\"></p> \n<p>The Small Business Administration offers several free business plan templates that can be used to inspire your own plan. Before you get started, you can decide what type of business plan you need -- a traditional or lean start-up plan.</p> \n<p>Then, you can review the format for both of those plans and view examples of what they might look like.</p> \n<h3>9. <a href=\"https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B7MRp5D7h2-YRC1aeDA1MEpxd2M/view\">Culina Sample Business Plan</a></h3> \n<p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/culina-business-plan-template.jpg?width=381&amp;name=culina-business-plan-template.jpg\" alt=\"Culina sample business plan template.\" width=\"381\" style=\"width: 381px; display: block; margin: 0px auto;\"></p> \n<p>Culina's sample business plan is a great template to use if you just want to fill in your information. You can also use this template as a guide while you're gathering important details. After looking at this sample, you'll have a better understanding of the data and research you need to do for your own business plan.</p> \n<h3>10. <a href=\"https://drive.google.com/file/d/0ByPuznSKHuX_NFBiZGxSNW45MDA/view\">Plum Sample Business Plan</a></h3> \n<p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/plum-sample-business-plan.jpg?width=369&amp;name=plum-sample-business-plan.jpg\" alt=\"Plum sample business plan.\" width=\"369\" style=\"width: 369px; display: block; margin: 0px auto;\"></p> \n<p>This is one of my favorite sample business plans, because you can see how implementing visuals can help tell the story of your brand. The images in this template are cutting edge, which makes sense for an innovative company like Plum. When you create your own business plan, make sure that the pictures and design you use make sense for your branding.</p> \n<p>Additionally, the financial charts included are incredibly helpful if you're not sure what financial information to include.</p> \n<h3>11. <a href=\"https://drive.google.com/file/d/0ByPuznSKHuX_THJ5YmtDWjgxNDg/view\">LiveShopBuy Sample Business Plan</a></h3> \n<p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/live-shop-buy-sample-business-plan.jpg?width=345&amp;name=live-shop-buy-sample-business-plan.jpg\" alt=\"LiveShopBuy business plan.\" width=\"345\" style=\"width: 345px; display: block; margin: 0px auto;\"></p> \n<p>With this business plan, the focus is the investment opportunity. This is an excellent template to use if you're going to use your business plan as a means to receive funding. The investment opportunity section is placed right up front and is several pages long. Then, the plan goes into more detail about the company synopsis industry analysis.</p> \n<p>When you're first getting starting on your business plan, it can be daunting. That's why it's important to make sure you understand the format and information you'll want to include. Then, you can use a template to guide your process.</p> \n<p><em>Editor's note: This post was originally published in November 2018 and has been updated for comprehensiveness.</em></p>  \n<img
